B

Ball - Class in breakout.model
The Ball is a class that moves and destroys blocks.
BALL_HEIGHT - Static variable in class breakout.model.Board
 
BALL_HEIGHT - Static variable in class breakout.view.BoardView
 
BALL_MAX_VELOCITY - Static variable in class breakout.model.Board
 
BALL_WIDTH - Static variable in class breakout.view.BoardView
 
ballFallsBelow(int) - Method in class breakout.model.Ball
Checks if ball falls below the view.
Block - Class in breakout.model
The Block class models a block that can be destroyed by Ball.
Block(int, int, int, int, BlockingQueue) - Constructor for class breakout.model.Block
Constructs Block with an x and y coordinate, row and column, and a queue to add a BlockDestroyedMessage when needed.
BLOCK_HEIGHT - Static variable in class breakout.view.BoardView
 
BLOCK_SEP - Static variable in class breakout.view.BoardView
 
BLOCK_WIDTH - Static variable in class breakout.view.BoardView
 
BlockDestroyedMessage - Class in breakout.controller
Message sent to signal when a block is destroyed
BlockDestroyedMessage(int, int) - Constructor for class breakout.controller.BlockDestroyedMessage
Initialize BlockDestroyedMessage with the position of the block
blocksAreCleared() - Method in class breakout.model.Board
Checks if the blocks are all cleared.
Board - Class in breakout.model
The Board class aggregates block, ball, and paddle.
Board(Insets, BlockingQueue) - Constructor for class breakout.model.Board
This is the constructor which initializes instance variables needed to aggregate ball, block and paddle.
BoardView - Class in breakout.view
Represents a view of the board.
BoardView(BlockingQueue<Message>, Insets, double[], double[]) - Constructor for class breakout.view.BoardView
This is the constructor where timer, board, and the starting locations of blocks, ball, and paddle are implemented.
breakout - package breakout
 
Breakout - Class in breakout.controller
The main system/controller of this game.
Breakout(View, BlockingQueue<Message>) - Constructor for class breakout.controller.Breakout
Initializes Breakout and the main JFrame that will display everything.
breakout.controller - package breakout.controller
 
breakout.model - package breakout.model
 
breakout.view - package breakout.view
